body_html: @benoitsteiner The awkward thing about that is that cumprod on multiple axes at a time is a very strange operation. It would implicitly flatten and expand, which would mean you have to do the same implicit flattening at the Eigen level.
body_text: @benoitsteiner The awkward thing about that is that cumprod on multiple axes at a time is a very strange operation.  It would implicitly flatten and expand, which would mean you have to do the same implicit flattening at the Eigen level.
body: @benoitsteiner The awkward thing about that is that cumprod on multiple axes at a time is a very strange operation.  It would implicitly flatten and expand, which would mean you have to do the same implicit flattening at the Eigen level.
